string.text: {=prebackstory_be_wanderer_wre_vegetius_str}My name is Publius Flavius Vegetius Renatus, but I answer to and prefer Vegetius.

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_wre_vegetius_str}I am a man of science. My primary science? Military science. My fascination with soldiery extends beyond simple plebeian adoration for procession, pomp, circumstance and the glory of conquest. War is itself a science that requires multiple ingredients to ensure maximum efficiency: training, organization, discipline, even the utilization of music is designed to keep the very soldiers in time! It seems ridiculous, but by God’s grace, it works!

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_wre_vegetius_str}You see, I have worked with comitatenses, the Palantini, Scholae and Limitanei. I will not bore you with their names. I have seen the execution of their will on soldiers throughout the Empire: against barbarians and Eastern interlopers.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_wre_vegetius_str}The drills, tactics, and methods they have permitted me to see? *pats his manuscript and then taps his skull* I assure you that with my knowledge, your army will know no fear, will know success, and will know to obey.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_wre_vegetius_str}Impressive. I could use a man of your experience!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_wre_vegetius_str}If I wanted to be lectured, I would visit a comitatus.
{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_wre_vegetius_str}Right. I'm currently writing a comprehensive militari treatise called De re militari, but i have experience with mercenary work too.

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_wre_vegetius_str}I am Publius Flavius Vegetius Renatus, veteran of the imperial army, expert at military training, tactics and logistics. If you want to know more, read my book, once it's finished.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_wre_phanes_str}I'm Phanes, if you're an enthusiast for the Olympic games, you may have heard of me!

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_wre_phanes_str}I've fought in countless arenas, particularly in the East. The din of the crowd and the faces of enemies are blinded by survival. I do recall fighting alongside -and against- my brother Horus.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_wre_phanes_str}We have trained since childhood to become the best athletes, wrestlers and fighters. And our training payed out too: ten years ago we competed in the games in Antiochia and won our first victories!

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_wre_phanes_str}I can still remember the cheers and adorations of the audience. Those were the days! Since then life has separated us, i wonder what's Horus up to these days...
{=response_1_be_wanderer_wre_phanes_str}I'm a great admirer of Olympic athletes! I'm honored to meet a champion such as you!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_wre_phanes_str}Playing in the arena is different from fighting on a battlefield. I'm looking for companions who i can rely on.
{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_wre_phanes_str}Well, i'm an arena champion, but i'm eager try myself in real combat, as long as i'm able to train and practice for the upcoming games!

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_wre_phanes_str}I'm a champion of the Olympic games, me and my brother Horus have fought in many arenas all over the empire. Since i've traveled to the west, we have not met, but i'm certain we will meet again in the next Olympic games!
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_wre_abundatius_str}I'm Abundatius, at your service.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_wre_abundatius_str}My parents immigrated to the empire when i was little, and by the grace of the Emperor we've been given land.
{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_wre_abundatius_str}They have raised me to be a faithful servant of the Empire, so i've decided to join the army.
{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_wre_abundatius_str}There isn't a more noble cause than fighting for the ideals you believe in!
{=response_1_be_wanderer_wre_abundatius_str}That's admirable indeed!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_wre_abundatius_str}But you're not even a roman!
{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_wre_abundatius_str}I'm not a roman by birth, but a roman in spirit! I believe i can achieve greatness, not just for me, but for the Empire!
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_wre_abundatius_str}I'm a son of Scythian immigrants, decided to join the army to better serve the Empire. There isn't much to my story, at least not yet.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}My name is Caelius Aurelianus. I'm a medical doctor.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}In an effort to chart the outbreak of plagues and maladies that afflict us, I have been pursuing inquiries as far south as Numidia.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}We have faced countless illnesses throughout the Empire's history, be it smallpox, malaria or typhoid. Just like a soldier, we must know the enemy, their movements and how to counteract them to preserve ourselves.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}I consider it more practical than virtuous. There are notable similarities between soldiery and medicine, particularly strategies. What's your own strategy, sir?
{=response_1_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}I have my own methods of fighting my enemies, but as a leader of a company, i see the merit in your approach!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}My strategies are none of your business. I have no interest in discussing them with someone of no relevant experties in leadership!

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}Think about it! When your men fall ill, how will you keep it from spreading to your entire company? How will you treat it? Herbal remedies are reactive,but you could save the supplies. A commander must be proactive instead of being reactive.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}I'm a medical doctor with over a decade of experience in various illnesses. I'm writing a book about chronic and acute maladies.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}My name is Caelius Aurelianus. I'm a medical doctor.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}In an effort to chart the outbreak of plagues and maladies that afflict us, I have been pursuing inquiries as far south as Numidia.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}We have faced countless illnesses throughout the Empire's history, be it smallpox, malaria or typhoid. Just like a soldier, we must know the enemy, their movements and how to counteract them to preserve ourselves.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}I consider it more practical than virtuous. There are notable similarities between soldiery and medicine, particularly strategies. What's your own strategy, sir?
{=response_1_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}I have my own methods of fighting my enemies, but as a leader of a company, i see the merit in your approach!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}My strategies are none of your business. I have no interest in discussing them with someone of no relevant experties in leadership!

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}Think about it! When your men fall ill, how will you keep it from spreading to your entire company? How will you treat it? Herbal remedies are reactive,but you could save the supplies. A commander must be proactive instead of being reactive.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_wre_caelius_str}I'm a medical doctor with over a decade of experience in various illnesses. I'm writing a book about chronic and acute maladies.

{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_wre_aurelius_str}I am Aurelius Victor, and I am a servant of Rome. When is an event never auspicious? It is only the miserable and ignorant that do not realize the ability to take advantage of chance.

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_wre_aurelius_str}We live in a period where a slave may become master, and his deeds can become mythical. Those that exist simultaneous either follow, confront, or observe. I am the latter, but which are you?
{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_wre_aurelius_str}What matters is that you and I are creating history. Whether by swinging the sword or by scribbling with ink, we leave our mark on the world.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_wre_aurelius_str}Pericles himself said, 'What you leave behind is not what is engraved in stone monuments, but what is woven into the lives of others.' This cannot be disputed, and I seek to leave a similar mark on the world.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_wre_aurelius_str}I know what I can accomplish, but what of you? What can you provide in place of a sword?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_wre_aurelius_str}Those are some fancy words, but you don't seem to be capable of much else.

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_wre_aurelius_str}First of all, I can swing a sword as any soldier can. But I can record your deeds spread your story for posterity and renown. I am also a capable administrator, so I can be of assistance with maintaining your camp.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_wre_aurelius_str}I'm first and foremost a writer, but i have a lot of experience in administration. For many years i've served Rome as governor in Pannonia.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_wre_leoparda_str}Tell me sir, what do you know of suffering?

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_wre_leoparda_str}The pain that suffering incurs is no stranger to any living being. Just like you, I am more than familiar with suffering: I am comfortable around it, which allows me to work.
{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_wre_leoparda_str}Do you think that soldiers are the only ones that bleed? I have delivered countless babes, nursed ailing wives and dispensed aid to ease their pain.
{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_wre_leoparda_str}I am the physician Leoparda. I have worked alongside the Emperor's own doctor. Simply ask Priscianus, when he can be pulled away from his scrolls.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_wre_leoparda_str}With such a prestigious honor, why are you concerned with my company? What can you offer?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_wre_leoparda_str}This conversation breeds more confusion than understanding. What can an emperor's midwife provide me?

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_wre_leoparda_str}As a physician, I know what herbal compounds counteract pain and can mend bones. What's more, my steady wits and hands will not be interrupted when removing arrows
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_wre_leoparda_str}I am a physician, who have served in the court of the Emperor's court for years, under master Priscianus.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_wre_egeria_str}My name is Egeria, i'm from a small village from a distant land.

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_wre_egeria_str}In my time spent here, many travelers come bearing trading goods and tales. We've seen men cut from multicolored cloth, telling stories of beasts, half-men, nymphs and battles. However, that does not concern me.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_wre_egeria_str}My thoughts are of Pilgrims. Men who've journeyed to the East to see where Christ walked. They follow His footsteps, heed His word, and give praise. I care not for fighting, but for illumination.
{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_wre_egeria_str}I yearn to go East to make my pilgrimage, but I have no money to pay for passage or protection. Will you have me?
{=response_1_be_wanderer_wre_egeria_str}I'd gladly help you on your way, but i'm leading a warband, and i can't guarantee your safety at all times.
{=response_2_be_wanderer_wre_egeria_str}And why should I allow you into my company? Can you fight as well as you can pray?

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_wre_egeria_str}This is not the first time I've traveled with soldiers. I've followed camps through difficult terrain, cooked enough meals to feed a legion and learned to be handy with a javelin when marauders would attempt to raid us
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_wre_egeria_str}I am but a humble pilgrim, all i wish for is to walk in the steps of Christ and write a journal about my travels for my congregation back home!
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_ere_ammianus_str}Questions will come later. First, please take a seat and enjoy wine with me!
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_ere_ammianus_str}I am Ammianus Marcellinus. I have served under countless notable commanders. Emperors and those who report directly to the Emperor.
{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_ere_ammianus_str}I have served in the protectores domestici, guarding the Emperor, the court and the Empire. I can stem a charge from any man or beast.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_ere_ammianus_str}This is my life. It is an honour that will be apprecaited. Simply mention my name at court, and you will see ears prick up and eyes dart in your direction. I contributed my sword arm, my attention to details, my tactical prowess, and my efficient management.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_ere_ammianus_str}Most impressive. I myself am leading a company of soldiers, and someone of your caliber could be of great value to us.
{=response_2_be_wanderer_ere_ammianus_str}This cannot be. Any man can make such claims!

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_ere_ammianus_str}I would be of use to any commander, not just for my knowledge but my sword arm. I'm still breathing, am I not? In addition, I have observed many viable tactics, efficient stewardship of an army, and have managed countless prisoners.

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_ere_ammianus_str}I'm a military veteran. I have served in the protectores domestici, guarding the Emperor, the court and the Empire. I can stem a charge from any man or beast.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_ere_oribasius_str}My name is Oribasius, I’m a physician of renowned quality.

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_ere_oribasius_str}I studied under Zeno of Cyprus at the school in Alexandria where I learned the medical sciences and then moved on to be the personal physician of the divine Julian himself.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_ere_oribasius_str}I was banished after I failed to save Julian from his mortal wound, and have served at foreign courts since, but have returned to Constantinople at Emperor Valens’ behest.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_ere_oribasius_str}Now I am compiling a collection of all the great medical writers of ages past, like Galen and Heraklas, which I hope will become a standard among my colleagues.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_ere_oribasius_str}Impressive, I could use a man of your repute and knowledge.
{=response_2_be_wanderer_ere_oribasius_str}If I wanted to be lectured, I would have gone to Alexandria.

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_ere_oribasius_str}Right, I’m currently in the middle of my writing, but experience in the field is always relevant to my work. I’ve also consulted with the Oracle at Delphi, if you require such divine guidance in the future.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_ere_oribasius_str}I'm a physician of renowned quality, i once served Emperor Julian, but after failing to safe him from a mortal wound, i was banished.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_ere_nemota_str}My name is Nemota, I am a Roman of great repute from the town of that name in Cyprus.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_ere_nemota_str}I served as tribunus over a numerus of the Auxilia Palatina in the Persian war, and then left for Ctesiphon as a diplomatic hostage.
{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_ere_nemota_str}I have a great deal of experience both in the command of infantry and diplomacy, having fought in many battles under the Emperor Julian.
{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_ere_nemota_str}My time with Persia spared me the political backlash of his death, where many of my friends and colleagues were slain.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_ere_nemota_str}Impressive, I could use a man of your command talents.
{=response_2_be_wanderer_ere_nemota_str}If I wanted to be lectured, I would have gone to the campidoctor.

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_ere_nemota_str}Right, my talents with the spear, sword, and shield are many. I commanded infantry, but did so from horseback with the other officers, so I am an experienced cavalryman as well.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_ere_nemota_str}I'm a veteran from the wars of Julian against Persia.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_ere_zosimus_str}My name is Zosimus.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_ere_zosimus_str}I'm a master of the Alchemical arts passed down to us by the angels who fell from Heaven and taught all the forbidden aspects of nature to women.
{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_ere_zosimus_str}Alchemica is the study of the composition of waters, of growth, of movement, of embodying and disembodying, and drawing and bonding the spirits to the body.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_ere_zosimus_str}I also study the transmutation of metals through purification. Much like a baptism, the divine water purifies the metal in the alchemical vessel with the tincturing vapors of mercury and sulfur.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_ere_zosimus_str}Impressive, I could use a man with such unique knowledge.
{=response_2_be_wanderer_ere_zosimus_str}It sounds like you’ve polluted alchemica with gnostic heresy.

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_ere_zosimus_str}I have written many works on these topics, containing knowledge in the purification of metals, in the creation of elixirs, and the spirit. I can create for you all sorts of concoctions from healing remedies to liquid fire.

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_ere_zosimus_str}I'm an alchemist, i have written many works on these topics, containing knowledge in the purification of metals, in the creation of elixirs, and the spirit.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_ere_horus_str}My name is Horus, I am an Olympian!

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_ere_horus_str}I have won at the games in Antioch and served the Praefectus Maximus in Egypt with my brother Phanes. I also am a great Rhetor, or at least I think as much. The ancient cynics are my guide in thought and writing.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_ere_horus_str}Naturally you may be more interested in my skills as a champion. I am a boxer, wrestler, and master of the schools of Pale, Pygmakhia, and Pankration. This has made me both a renowned showman and a valued member of Maximus’ retinue.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_ere_horus_str}Of course I can be discreet, although my fame can make it difficult. But an inconspicuous boxer and wrestler makes for a fine bodyguard that can blend in with the bureaucrats.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_ere_horus_str}Impressive, a man of your skill would have no trouble in battle.
{=response_2_be_wanderer_ere_horus_str}Right, well I’ve never heard of you.

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_ere_horus_str}You will find no better fighter than myself, except maybe those who are skilled with the sword or spear. I’ve taken a great interest in Drama and Cynicism recently, but would be glad to contribute my talents to your retinue.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_ere_horus_str}I'm an Olympic champion, me and my brother Phanes have won many honors in the games.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_wre_victoria_str}My name is Victoria.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_wre_victoria_str}I'm a physician, trained by the well respected master, Priscianus!
{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_wre_victoria_str}Together with two other women, Salvina and Leoparda, we've served in the court of the Western Emperor.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_wre_victoria_str}I remember the methods of Leoparda, by the Gods, they were awful! Even Priscianus noted in his book how her remedies are no more scientific than that of Dioscorides. I have no idea how she became a respected gynecologist...
{=response_1_be_wanderer_wre_victoria_str}I hope you've learned some actual skills from your teacher!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_wre_victoria_str}If that's good enough for your school, how can i be certain that your skills are any better?

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_wre_victoria_str}I've actually studied and performed experiments with my remedies to improve what i knew or abandon the ineffective techniques. While Leoparda relies on 'traditional' methods, i'm actually able to save lifes, instead of just giving some opium for the pain.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_wre_victoria_str}I'm a physician, trained by the well respected master, Priscianus.

{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_celt_cinhil_str}To think this is how a commoner would address royalty. May the Gods blind me and deafen my ears...Since you are listening already, indulge me and listen to my tale, stranger.

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_celt_cinhil_str}Far above the Roman wall, north of the Selcovii and west of the Votadini, I ruled the Damnonii. My people had done well, cooperating with the Romans since the time of Antoninus. Our men fought in their service. But as seasons passed, payments would slow. The Picts were raiding our routes and encroaching on our ancestral homes.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_celt_cinhil_str}We gathered, forged an army and set out to combat the bastards. We met and fought bitterly, but my men were overwhelmed. The Picts took me prisoner and marched me back to my own home, forcing me to provide them with spoils. They sought to make an example of me before my kin, but my imprisoned kin were able to create a distraction to allow me to escape. Riches, furs, lands, women. All gone.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_celt_cinhil_str}Days and days, I trundled and scavenged throughout until I came to the wall and plead my case. Now I brood as I wait for financial backing in order to muster an army and take back my home.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_celt_cinhil_str}What a tale. So you are looking to make money?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_celt_cinhil_str}Brooding drunkenly in taverns won't help you reclaim your lands...

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_celt_cinhil_str}That's right! I'm thinking of mercenary work, I am a capable swordsman, spearman and you would not want to be on the receiving end of my bow or javelin. I can also instill discipline and loyalty in men with little effort

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_celt_cinhil_str}I was once the king of the Damnonii, until the Picts taken over. Now i'm travelling the country, trying to gather money and supporters, so one day i may reclaim my lands!
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_celt_setana_str}Of course, stranger! I was born by the name Setana, but nowadays people only know me as 'The Hound of Culann'.

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_celt_setana_str}It's a fascinating story: When i was a child, me and my father visited the smith called Culann at a feast. After meeting him, Culann invited father into the house while i was still outside, and not expecting anyone else, he unleashed his guard dog into the courtyard...

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_celt_setana_str}The beast was ferocious, and after it noticed me within the fence, it charged me with deadly force. The only chance i had was to pick up a nearby stone and smash in it's head. After witnessing what i've done, Culann was impressed by my strength, but the loss of his dog devastated him.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_celt_setana_str}Something had to be done to rectify his loss. I've felt so guilty after killing my host's watchdog, that i promised to find him a new pup and guard the estate myself, until the dog is old enough to do the job. So that's how i became 'Culann's Hound'.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_celt_setana_str}What a fascinating story! Would you be interested in mercenary work?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_celt_setana_str}I care not for your name, but your skills. Would you be interested in mercenary work?

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_celt_setana_str}This would not be the first time a warchief asked me to serve him. Know that i'm no ordinary footman! I've trained with Scatha, if you know of her, i need not say more!
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_celt_setana_str}I'm a warrior and former guard of Culann, the smith. I've trained with Scatha in the art of war.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_celt_scatha_str}Certainly, Dear!
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_celt_scatha_str}I'm Scatha. Scatha the Warrior Maid.
{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_celt_scatha_str}I've been teaching the art of war for a decade, trained many well respected warriors, most of them are still alive thanks to my techiques.
{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_celt_scatha_str}Currently i don't have any new students, so if you wish to hone your skills with the sword, spear or javelin, you've come to the right person!
{=response_1_be_wanderer_celt_scatha_str}I can't stay for your lessons, but maybe you could join my companions. We could all benefit from your teachings!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_celt_scatha_str}I have no interest in your lessons, only your skills. Can you handle yourself in real combat, outside your training grounds?

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_celt_scatha_str}This wouldn't be the first time i fought alongside men like you. My skills with the sword and spear are unparralelled, just don't expect me to be your army cook!
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_celt_scatha_str}I'm a teacher of the art of war, but i also have experience fighting in armies.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_celt_torna_str}My name is Torna, you may have heard of me as 'Torna the Sage'.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_celt_torna_str}No? I suppose you're not from around here. I was the foster-father of King Niall.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_celt_torna_str}A long time ago when i was a young lad, one day i walked through a forest when i heard the cry of a small babe, barely a day old. I took him home and raised him as my own. Only later did i discover who his mother was, the Queen of the Iverni!

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_celt_torna_str}Niall grew up to be a capable man, after finding out about his royal heritage, he determined to reclaim his place in the royal court. And after years of struggle, he achieved his dream, now ruling as High King!
{=response_1_be_wanderer_celt_torna_str}That's very noble of you! But then, why aren't you with the king?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_celt_torna_str}Sounds like a spurious tale. If you're such a hero, why are you in smokey taverns instead of the royal keep?

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_celt_torna_str}What i did, i did for the boy's well being. I never wanted riches or titles. I'm a poet by profession who's rather perform songs of old and drink some good mead with my friends. I may be old, but i'm still an adventurer in heart!
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_celt_torna_str}I'm a poet, but most people know me for being the foster-father of king Niall.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_celt_cathbad_str}Cathbad is my name.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_celt_cathbad_str}I'm a druid, follower of the old Gods and seer of the future!
{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_celt_cathbad_str}But that's not all i am: i'm a warrior and leader of a band of fianna, some of them might even be around the town.
{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_celt_cathbad_str}I could list the fulfilled prophecies and heroic deeds of mine, but the sun might set before i would finish it!
{=response_1_be_wanderer_celt_cathbad_str}A Fennid and A Druid in one person. Fascinating. Are you looking for work?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_celt_cathbad_str}Don't think that i'd believe a single word about your prophecies, but you look like a capable fighter
{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_celt_cathbad_str}Certainly! I have decades of training and experience in warfare, ambush, herbal medicine and archery. I'd be a valuable member of any company.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_celt_cathbad_str}I'm a Druid and Fennid mercenary. I've led a company of warriors myself until i met you.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_german_natuspardo_str}Mhm. Very well. I'm Natuspardo, veteran of many battles.

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_german_natuspardo_str}I've served under Emperor Valentinianus for a decade, until six summers ago. We were leading a punitive expedition against the alemannic petty king, Rando.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_german_natuspardo_str}That dog massacred the entire town of Mogontiacum, and retreated to alemannic lands. Valentinianus was ruthlessly pursuing the enemy deep into their home territory. If you remember the story of the Teutoburg defeat, you might already know what a horrible idea that is.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_german_natuspardo_str}When we met the enemy, our chances were not much better, but with my disciplined men and competent leadership, we held the lines for hours. Finally, the alemannic ranks weakened and Sebastianus attacked them from the flank and routed them. By god, i have never seen so many dead bodies on a battlefield...
{=response_1_be_wanderer_german_natuspardo_str}I suppose much of those bodies were from your side...
{=response_2_be_wanderer_german_natuspardo_str}But you've triumphed! Casualties are expected in war...

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_german_natuspardo_str}Yes. But on that day, it was avoidable. Honestly it was a miracle that we even beat them at all. Even though i've recieved honors for my bravery, i would never take part in such a disaster ever again!
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_german_natuspardo_str}I'm a veteran targeteer, formerly serving in the army of Valentinianus.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_german_charietto_str}Of course, stranger!
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_german_charietto_str}I'm Charietto, the headhunter. If you need somebody dead, you call me. I've been taking on many bounties for various warlords along the Rhenus river.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_german_charietto_str}On one occasion, even the roman emperor hired me against a group of particularly troublesome band of quadians. Me and my merry men exterminated nearly all of the enemy raiders, taking the rest captives.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_german_charietto_str}As it happens, the son of the quadian king was leading these raiders! Needless to say, the king pleaded for peace immediately, fearing for the life of his son. In other words, i ended a war!
{=response_1_be_wanderer_german_charietto_str}It seems like you always know the right people to kill!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_german_charietto_str}You just got lucky...

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_german_charietto_str}May it be luck or skill, but the fact is, whoever i set my target on, is a dead man. But ever since my service with the emperor, i didn't have the most well paying employers.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_german_charietto_str}I'm a headhunter, adept in scouting, tracking and ambuscade. I'm a good fighter, but i excel at javelin throwing.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_german_gomoar_str}My name is Gomoar. If you want to hear my story, i will tell you. But this is no heroic tale i'm afraid.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_german_gomoar_str}About eight years ago, i was involved in the battles of the Roman Emperor Valens, fighting against the usurper Procopius, far from home.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_german_gomoar_str}After the battle of Thyatira, i made a decision that haunts me to this day. You see I was loyal to Procopius before realising that it was a lost cause, so I defected to Valens. I only betrayed Procopius out of survival, but he glared at me, his former friend, until his head was cut off in front of a cackling Valens. I still see the blood gushing out of the true emperor's neck, staining the turf red, as well as my hands

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_german_gomoar_str}My hands remains stained with the blood of Procopius, I cannot wipe off such a disgrace. After realizing what i've done, i've renounced my military titles and i'm living a simple life ever since.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_german_gomoar_str}Do not let that loyalty go to waste Gomoar, you can still make amends in service for a great cause!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_german_gomoar_str}You're a coward Gomoar. Simply hiding from your responsibilities won't lift your shame!
{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_german_gomoar_str}You're probably right. Perhaps there is still chance for me afterall!

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_german_gomoar_str}I'm a former military commander, i've served the usurper Procopius, but to my shame, i've betrayed him for Valens. Now i'm trying to lead a life far from imperial politics.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_german_aigil_str}My name is Aigil
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_german_aigil_str}It's no exaggeration to call myself a master archer, the best in all of germania!

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_german_aigil_str}One time a king heard of my talents and forced me to try to shoot an apple from my son's head. Proving myself is one thing, but to risk my child's life for it?
{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_german_aigil_str}I had no choice but to obey. But i readied two arrows: One for the apple, and one for the king, in case my first shot hit my son...
{=response_1_be_wanderer_german_aigil_str}And did your aim find the target?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_german_aigil_str}You shot your son?
{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_german_aigil_str}As you can see, i'm still alive, so i never needed the second arrow.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_german_aigil_str}I'm a master archer, the best in all of germania!
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_german_alruna_str}Of course, friend!
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_german_alruna_str}I'm Alruna, wife of Aigil the Marksman. He is in a different town running an errand.
{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_german_alruna_str}A few years ago, we together defended a keep by ourselves against a band of marauders.
{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_german_alruna_str}Of course being the master archer, Aigil dealt with most of the attackers, but those who made it close enough, met the end of my blade!
{=response_1_be_wanderer_german_alruna_str}That's an admirable feat, worthy of a poem!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_german_alruna_str}That doesn't sound credible at all...

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_german_alruna_str}Well, i'm not much of a warrior, but i can defend myself and i can use the sling quite well! But i have other skills as well, i'm good at trading, managing a camp and i know many healing herbs.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_german_alruna_str}I'm the wife of Aigil the Marksman. I'm a good steward, competent trader and healer.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_german_eric_str}Eric is the name my mother gave me, a common name in my tribe; the Suiones of Scandza.

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_german_eric_str}The Suiones are the greatest tribe of Scandza; the land beyond Germania, who have always been ruled by my great clan, the Ynglings. We are famed for our ships that are swifter then Thonar's Chariot, perfect for raiding poor fishermen. I was king of the Suiones for most of my young life and my brother Alaric ruled with me. But we were both in love with the same woman, a shieldmaden - a temptress, who played upon our jealousies!

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_german_eric_str}My brother and I quarreled. I had drunk too much. He slapped me with a loaf of rye bread, and I spit him upon my sword... My own brother! My sword-arm was stained with the blood of my kin! Oh the blunder, I fear the scalds may sing of Eric the kin-slayer for millennia. The sons of Alaric, who now rule the tribe, soon banished me for the murder

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_german_eric_str}I trekked south with only a sword and a slave, the latter coming in handy, sleeping in barns until I reached a great empire, with roads that I could travel on at double speed, leading to cities of stone and brick and winters mild. Being betrayed by my now distant tribe, I aspire to Romanitas, I even tried becoming a citizen a couple of summers ago, serving the auxiliary, before realizing that brigands would treat me better.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_german_eric_str}There are opportunities in this world greater than being a roman citizen. If you are handy with that sword of yours, you may achieve greatness!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_german_eric_str}If you use your sword for slaying your enemies, rather than your kin, you may atone for this great sin.
{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_german_eric_str}One day I may enter Woden's halls for my valor, but i haven't found a worthy cause to fight for yet.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_german_eric_str}I'm an exiled king from the Suiones tribe, from the northern lands of Scandza. I've sailed south in pursuit of a new life.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_german_sigurd_str}Mhm. Very well.

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_german_sigurd_str}You may have heard of Sigurd the Dragon Slayer. A legendary warrior, strong enough to throw his opponents over the shieldwall. Yet although he posses brute strength, he fights with speed and grace, unlike most fighters.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_german_sigurd_str}Well, that man is me. The admirers and poets tend to exaggerate things, painting me as some sort of legend. In truth, most of it comes down to a good fitness regime and a sharp mind. I train, I study, and I win.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_german_sigurd_str}I've wandered the north, challenging the best warriors in each village to duels. These are times of war, however, and I have realized that maybe my talents would have more use in battle, leading warriors to victory.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_german_sigurd_str}Indeed! Any commander would be thankful with such a warrior at their side!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_german_sigurd_str}You strike me as a competent fellow, but an arrogant one!
{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_german_sigurd_str}Maybe. But i'm not only a good fighter, but i've proven to be more fit for leading than to follow others. I will not fight for an incompetent commander!
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_german_sigurd_str}I'm a great warrior and leader, if you respect me as such, we'll get along just fine.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_german_arngrim_str}Hah, the balls on this one! So you are not afraid of me like the others here?
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_german_arngrim_str}I'm a berserker from Scandza, looking for adventures in these lands.
{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_german_arngrim_str}For a while i was serving as chieftain for a king, fighting many battles and conquering lands, until no opponent remained worthy of my attention.
{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_german_arngrim_str}But i know little of Cimbria and the realms of the south. Tell me, are there worthy foes in these lands?
{=response_1_be_wanderer_german_arngrim_str}There certainly are! But you'll need a guide and companions. Incidentally, i'm a leader of a warband.
{=response_2_be_wanderer_german_arngrim_str}I'm a worthy opponent! I'd challenge you if i wasn't looking for a warrior like yourself for my party.
{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_german_arngrim_str}Hmm, you don't look very strong. But there aren't any better choices around here either... Let's just say, i'll consider it.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_german_arngrim_str}I'm a berserker from Scandza.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_german_masila_str}Of course, friend!
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_german_masila_str}I'm Masila, from the Suebi tribe.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_german_masila_str}I've grown up in a farmstead near Eburodonum. My family isn't of noble birth, although we were often invited to the halls of Medoslanium, for my father was a literate man who served as scribe of the chieftain.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_german_masila_str}I made plenty of friends with soldiers, often trained and hunted with them. Although i was never allowed to go on any campaigns yet, i think i am more than ready to become a warrior!
{=response_1_be_wanderer_german_masila_str}I happen to lead a warband. If i were to accept you, what skills could you offer?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_german_masila_str}You are but a whelp, boy! What use would you be of a commander?

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_german_masila_str}Well, as you know, my father was a scribe, he taught me how to read and write, and i've read a lot about warfare and leadership. But when it comes to fighting, i can hold my own, and i'm a quite decent archer!
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_german_masila_str}I'm an aspiring warrior from the Suebi tribe. I have a good understanding of logistics and leadership, although i have no practical experience
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_gothic_ulfilas_str}My name is Ulfilas, a Goth and a Christian, humble servant of our lord and his son, Jesus Christ.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_gothic_ulfilas_str}I was consecrated by the great father Eusebius of Nicomedia, pupil of the school of Lucian of Antioch and friend to Arius.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_gothic_ulfilas_str}I have travelled far and wide spreading the teachings of Arius and Eusebius across the Roman Empire and Barbaricum. Now I am leader and chorepiscopus of the Goths in Nicopolis, welcomed as a refugee of persecution by the late Constantius, and respected among the Christians of the empire.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_gothic_ulfilas_str}I have written many works on theology and exegesis, and debated at the Councils of both Sirmium and Constantinople. My great work is the translation of God’s word into the language of my people, with the help of my devoted colleagues and pupils of our church
{=response_1_be_wanderer_gothic_ulfilas_str}You clearly have many connections and a great deal of influence with the church and the imperial court
{=response_2_be_wanderer_gothic_ulfilas_str}You’re not even a proper bishop, how are you useful to me?

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_gothic_ulfilas_str}While I cannot condone the sin of murder and fight alongside you, I have been an administrator of my people and our community for many years now. I am a charismatic man in both teaching and debate, and have befriended many in the Emperor’s and Patriarchs’ circles, despite our differences in the particulars of Christ’s nature.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_gothic_ulfilas_str}My name is Ulfilas, a Goth and a Christian, humble servant of our lord and his son, Jesus Christ.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_gothic_gainas_str}My name is Gainas, I am a warrior of my people.

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_gothic_gainas_str}I grew up in Dacia and Gothia, but have already travelled far in my young age in the employ of the Romans. I have served in the retainers of many optimates, and was trained in the Roman manner in their employ.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_gothic_gainas_str}I am skilled in the use of the spear, sword, javelin, and shield, and also have basic training for fighting on horseback. With my skill and training, along with my growing reputation and connections with esteemed men, I hope to obtain command of my own numerus or be granted a canton soon.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_gothic_gainas_str}I have made acquaintances in the highest echelons of the many Gothic courts and in the Roman military. However, I have been held back by my lack of lineage. The Romans have provided me my family and my education, but it has proven difficult to advance through merit in a court of intrigue.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_gothic_gainas_str}You have clearly done well for yourself as a soldier then.
{=response_2_be_wanderer_gothic_gainas_str}I’d resent those around me for holding me back in such circumstances, why should I expect you to be loyal?

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_gothic_gainas_str}I have served the Romans loyally for some time now, but I seek whatever opportunity that comes before me, be that on the battlefield or in the political arena.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_gothic_gainas_str}I am a warrior of my people. I grew up in Dacia and Gothia, but have already travelled far in my young age in the employ of the Romans.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_gothic_andela_str}My name is Andela, an esteemed noble of the Amal family, the clan of Vinitharius himself.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_gothic_andela_str}The Amali have a long and proud history, intermarried among all the Gothic peoples and those we have subjected to our sway.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_gothic_andela_str}While there are those who would say I come from a lesser lineage among my kin, my family has no lack of prestige or holdings. My canton is large with many warriors, and I have fought in many battles against the fair-haired horse-dwellers who encroach on our homes.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_gothic_andela_str}I am travelling the world seeking allies in our fight against the Alans and these newcomers from the far East, a people that the Bactrian merchants call ounna. Many of the surrounding gentes have banded together against them, but raiding ravages our farms and hunger has set in, and my people grow desparate.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_gothic_andela_str}You clearly are a man of great prestige, have you fought these barbarians yourself?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_gothic_andela_str}Why should I care about the plight of some nation of pale and effeminate barbarians in the north?

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_gothic_andela_str}As a noble of my house I am skilled on horseback and command, with great prowess with the lance, bow, and sword. Although I have not spent my life on horseback and shooting like the nomads who beset us, you will find few that can match me as a cavalrymen, and none who have my connections among the families around the Euxine sea.

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_gothic_andela_str}I'm an esteemed noble of the Amal family. As a noble of my house I am skilled on horseback and command, with great prowess with the lance, bow, and sword.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_gothic_sigesarius_str}My name is Sigesarius, a follower of the teachings of the holy Ulfilas.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_gothic_sigesarius_str}I was one of his many pupils who helped translate the bible to Gothic, and created a new script for my people.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_gothic_sigesarius_str}Like my tutor, I am an advocate of the Homoian belief of the substance and nature of Christ, following in the footsteps of his master Eusebius. Unlike Arius, we believe Christ was not created out of nothing, but of similar substance as God from God.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_gothic_sigesarius_str}My beliefs were condemned at Sirmium, but the imperial brothers’ wisdom has allowed me to again travel the world convincing others of Christ’s true nature. It is a dangerous life, as our Christian communities fight among each other instead of the unbelieving.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_gothic_sigesarius_str}I’m not familiar with these teachings, but I do not see any reason for you to be persecuted for your faith.
{=response_2_be_wanderer_gothic_sigesarius_str}I’m not too keen on having those condemned as heretics among my entourage.

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_gothic_sigesarius_str}Like Ulfilas I have spent many years helping the Goths of Moesia, seeing to their needs and curing them of their ailments. I also have been quite charismatic in my debates with the followers of Arius and the adherents to Nicaea.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_gothic_sigesarius_str}I was one of Ulfila's many pupils who helped translate the bible to Gothic
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_gothic_belleridus_str}Now, why would I tell a stranger about myself for no reason? Do you know what kind of problems that can put you in?

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_gothic_belleridus_str}People talk too much, especially at taverns. And it is my job to listen. Most people tend to avoid me. It suits me well. Catch unwanted attention in my work and you end up dead, which makes blending in with the crowd the best option.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_gothic_belleridus_str}I usually don't open up to people like this, but you seem like someone who could make use of my services. You see, I deal in information. Local lords, crime bosses, merchants - they are all my clients. I know what goes on in town, the best deals at the market, and who goes in and out.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_gothic_belleridus_str}It's a lucrative business, but not exactly problem-free. With my kind of clients, it is inevitable to make some enemies along the way. In fact, and don't look now, I am quite sure that those men over there are ready to jump me as soon as I step out of the tavern.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_gothic_belleridus_str}Hmm, do you need any help?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_gothic_belleridus_str}It sounds like you brought this on yourself.
{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_gothic_belleridus_str}Ha! I'm sure I can manage them on my own. But maybe it is time for a career change; it seems like I have outstayed my welcome here.

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_gothic_belleridus_str}I deal in information. Local lords, crime bosses, merchants - they are all my clients. I know what goes on in town, the best deals at the market, and who goes in and out.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_slavic_sadko_str}I'm Sadko, wandering poet, musician and merchant of exotic goods.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_slavic_sadko_str}I've traveled the world for ten years now, from the frozen coast of the north, to the magnificent walls of Constantinopolis!
{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_slavic_sadko_str}I've witnessed things, you could never dream of. And i've written songs to pass on these magnificent tales for the generations to come!
{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_slavic_sadko_str}If you wish, i can sing you you a song about my voyages of the western sea!
{=response_1_be_wanderer_slavic_sadko_str}Thank you Sadko, maybe later. You seem to have experience that may be useful for a travelling warband.
{=response_2_be_wanderer_slavic_sadko_str}I have no interest in your songs. I'd rather hear if you have some useful skills too.

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_slavic_sadko_str}You don't think music and songs are useful for a company of warriors? If that's not enough, i have other skills that may be of use: i speak many languages, i'm able strike the best deals when bargaining for supplies and i can guide an army through seemingly impassable terrain. Is that useful enough for you?
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_slavic_sadko_str}I'm a wandering poet, musician and merchant. I want to share the songs about my journeys.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_slavic_volkh_str}Well met!
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_slavic_volkh_str}People call me Volkh, the Wolf-Man. As you can see, i have a wolf pelt on my shoulders, but i assure you, i'm no maneater!
{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_slavic_volkh_str}During my years of adventuring, i made a name for myself as a capable mercenary and headhunter.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_slavic_volkh_str}As it turns out, it's beneficial to let people spread rumours about your exploits, it makes you more of a legend than a person. And with notoriety comes higher pay!
{=response_1_be_wanderer_slavic_volkh_str}But aren't you misleading the public with this performance?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_slavic_volkh_str}You are but a scam artist!

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_slavic_volkh_str}Don't insult me! I'm a honest adventurer who takes his commitments seriously. I'm not telling the common folk what rumours to propagate. And i hope you won't find me immodest when i say, my exploits are worthy to tell tales about!

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_slavic_volkh_str}I'm an adventurer, taking on mercenary or bounty hunting jobs. I've become quite famous around these parts as someone with otherworldly abilities. Although exaggerated, i'm fond of these legends.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_slavic_mikula_str}Eh? Why do you want to know me of all people?
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_slavic_mikula_str}My name is Mikula, a simple peasant from a village you never heard of.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_slavic_mikula_str}Although, i feel that i'm destined for something more. Growing up i was always the strongest amongst boys my age, first at fieldwork and my woodwork is still the best in quality.
{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_slavic_mikula_str}But still, peasant life never satisfied me...
{=response_1_be_wanderer_slavic_mikula_str}Someone of your strength could become a great warrior with training, if you join the army!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_slavic_mikula_str}Know your place peasant! A man must accept his place, and yours is in the service of your lord!

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_slavic_mikula_str}Bah! I was never fond of the high-handed mandates of the fancy lords, otherwise i could keep serving the village chief. No, i need a job with some autonomy, where i can fulfill my potential!
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_slavic_mikula_str}I'm a peasant. I'm strong, i'm capable, but never had the opportunity to make something of myself... Until now!
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_sarmatian_saul_str}My name is Saulus.

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_sarmatian_saul_str}I'm a simple herdsman from a village near Gargaza. I've learned how to use the lance and ride a horse, but other than chasing away some raiders from the village, i've never really had the opportunity to try myself in real combat.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_sarmatian_saul_str}Life was hard, but i could always rely on my trusty steed, 'Kolos'. She was the best horse i've ever ridden, instictively knowing every command before even i would give the signal. I was planning to join the army as a lancer, to push back the invading huns.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_sarmatian_saul_str}Sadly, Kolos has passed away last month, her meat was her final gift to me. Now i'm a rider without a horse, with no money to buy a new one. The only animal i have left is a stubborn mule...
{=response_1_be_wanderer_sarmatian_saul_str}Surely you must have other skills you could utilize in the army!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_sarmatian_saul_str}A real warrior doesn't need a horse to be effective in combat!
{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_sarmatian_saul_str}Even so, what kind of commander would hire an Alanian warrior who can only ride a mule into battle? I'd be laughed at for even suggesting such an idea.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_sarmatian_saul_str}I'm a horseman who recently lost his steed, i've been looking for work ever since, so i can afford a new horse.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_sarmatian_dula_str}Of course, stranger, let's drink a cup of mead together!
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_sarmatian_dula_str}I'm Dula, some call me 'Prince Dula', although i'm related to royalty only by fellowship, rather than blood.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_sarmatian_dula_str}You see, i've served my time in the alanian army, and in one battle i was lucky enough to save King Beler after he got separated and dragged off his horse by bosporan infantry.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_sarmatian_dula_str}After the battle, Beler was so grateful for my help, he offered a position within his bodyguard unit. As years gone by, i became a trusted advisor and a good friend of his. Since we were quite inseparable, he jokingly referred to me as his adopted son, hence the nickname 'Prince Dula'.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_sarmatian_dula_str}I suspect you are no longer in the service of the king. What happened?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_sarmatian_dula_str}If you're such a trusted bodyguard, why aren't you guarding the king right now?

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_sarmatian_dula_str}Well, times have changed. I had my disagreements with the other nobles about strategic decisions regarding the war with the huns and the king has taken their side over mine. I've been dismissed from my position, but i feel that's probably a good thing. I have never feared death, but i have to take care of my two daughters now, and this way i don't have to leave them as orphans by dying in a pointless war...

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_sarmatian_dula_str}I'm a warrior, royal bodyguard and advisor by profession. King Beler has elevated me into nobility, but since we had our disagreements, i'm left without a job.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_sarmatian_ardabur_str}I'm Ardabur, mercenary for hire.
{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_sarmatian_ardabur_str}...
{=response_1_be_wanderer_sarmatian_ardabur_str}You're not much of a talker, are you?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_sarmatian_ardabur_str}Has the cat got your tongue?
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_sarmatian_ardabur_str}I'm a mercenary.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_sarmatian_modares_str}I'm Modares, son of Rassogos. My line of ancestry goes back to the times of Royal Scythia.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_sarmatian_modares_str}But all that doesn't matter anymore. I'm disgraced amongst my people, brought shame to my family name forever...

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_sarmatian_modares_str}What happened? I'll tell you: Love happened. I've fallen in love with the wrong woman, none other than my wife's sister. After the husband found out about our affair, he challenged me to a duel to the death to defend his honor.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_sarmatian_modares_str}As you can see, i'm still here. But killing him was the easy part: now my entire family has turned against me, i have no friends left and even my lover has shunned me for killing her husband. I have no place left on this earth...
{=response_1_be_wanderer_sarmatian_modares_str}Then maybe the best course of action would be to leave these lands forever.
{=response_2_be_wanderer_sarmatian_modares_str}You'll have to live with this shame for the rest of your life.

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_sarmatian_modares_str}I know, Stranger. After i drink myself under the table, i'll take my belongings and head to Roman lands. Maybe there i can start a new life. I've heard they don't care much for who you are, as long as you serve

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_sarmatian_modares_str}I'm a noble of Royal Scythian descent. But after making a fatal mistake, i've brought dishonor to my name and now i only wish to leave everything behind and forget about the past.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_hunnic_eskam_str}Very well.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_hunnic_eskam_str}I'm Eskam, Shaman of the Eternal Sky!

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_hunnic_eskam_str}If you are not familiar with hunnic customs, know that shamans are the most important members of the tribe, right after the chieftains. We act as mediators between the spirit realms, scryers of the future and healers of both mind and body.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_hunnic_eskam_str}Without our guidance, people are hopelessly lost in the material world, unaware of the many harmful spirits who may hinder one's life. Shamans are able to gaze into other realms of existence, obtaining knowledge ordinary humans can never dream of.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_hunnic_eskam_str}I know about the role of Shamans. I just question how could a young man such as yourself have the widom to be trusted with such responsibility?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_hunnic_eskam_str}Sounds like nonsense to me. You don't strike me as one with otherworldly knowledge...

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_hunnic_eskam_str}It's true, i am young, but i've learned the ways of the shaman since childhood. You see, my father is a respected shaman of my tribe and he taught me well. I know which herbs heal or harm, or even induce spiritual encounters. But father said that i'll need more worldly experience before i can take my place as shaman of the tribe. So here i am, looking to find a place where i can utilize my skills.

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_hunnic_eskam_str}I'm a shaman, i've learned about the spiritual realm my entire life. Currently i'm seeking to obtain more earthly skills, so i'll be able to return to my tribe with a balanced knowledge of all walks of life.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_hunnic_sandeces_str}My name is Sandeces, at your service!

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_hunnic_sandeces_str}I've been living in the steppes all my life. After my parents died, i had to learn to survive by myself at an early age. I became a good rider and archer, and i can take care of myself in hand-to hand combat.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_hunnic_sandeces_str}For a while i've joined up with a group of bandits, but since a disagreement with the boss resulted in the loss of his head, my former associates have been hunting me.
{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_hunnic_sandeces_str}Now i'm without money, friends and luck. I'd very much like to leave town for greener pastures, bandit life was never to my liking anyway...
{=response_1_be_wanderer_hunnic_sandeces_str}A capable young man like you can always find his place in an army!
{=response_2_be_wanderer_hunnic_sandeces_str}A former bandit might have the skills to join a warband, if they don't impale you first!

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_hunnic_sandeces_str}I was considering to enlist in the mercenary band called the Unnigarde, but they've moved west already. Until i meet them again, i'll consider other options too.
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_hunnic_sandeces_str}I'm a former bandit, adept at riding and archery. I'm looking to make a name for myself as a mercenary.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_hunnic_honagur_str}My friends call me Honagur, my enemies call me 'the Beast'.

{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_hunnic_honagur_str}Not a flattering title, but i care not for flattery. I've been striking fear into my enemies hearts since i was boy, and as a warrior, fear is my greatest ally.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_hunnic_honagur_str}I've lived a life of raiding and conquering, always fighting in the first wave. I've learned that to ensure victory, it's best to break your enemies before the battle even starts.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_hunnic_honagur_str}I often challenge the enemy leaders to single combat, proving how cowardly they are if they refuse, or how weak they are when i tear open their guts in front of the entire army. No matter how they choose, the enemy spirits are broken from the start!
{=response_1_be_wanderer_hunnic_honagur_str}That seems to be an effective strategy. But wouldn't it backfire if the enemy champion bests you?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_hunnic_honagur_str}Just because you are tall and ugly, doesn't make you a beast. You can be cut down like anyone else.

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_hunnic_honagur_str}Only if the enemy champion is my equal, which has never happened before. My arms are strong, my lance is sturdy and my armor is impenetrable! If you doubt my words, challenge me to a fight, i promise, it will be the last decision you'll ever make!

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_hunnic_honagur_str}I'm a warrior and a raider. During my years in war, i've mastered the art of terror, and now all who know my name tremble in fear. And they are right to be afraid.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_hunnic_alpabay_str}You should be careful to address me with respect, stranger!
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_hunnic_alpabay_str}My name is Alpabay, son of the great King, Balamber!

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_hunnic_alpabay_str}You might ask, why am i holed up in a tavern, instead of the royal court in Atil? You see, my mother's relationship with Balamber wasn't exactly official, so the so-called 'nobles' call me illegitimate heir, even though i'm the oldest son of the king.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_hunnic_alpabay_str}The worst part is that my half brothers always looked at me with disdain, and their mother even convinced Balamber to exile me. So now, i'm living life as an outcast, with no status, no name and no clan to call my own.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_hunnic_alpabay_str}No son should be treated this way. But you still have the opportunity to make a name for yourself, on your own merits.
{=response_2_be_wanderer_hunnic_alpabay_str}You can't expect to be treated as royalty if you're just a bastard! You have to man up and carve out your own destiny!

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_hunnic_alpabay_str}You're right, stranger. I'm thinking about making a name for myself as a warrior, show the world what i'm capable of! I promise you, one day everybody will know my name!
{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_hunnic_alpabay_str}I'm the 'bastard' son of Balamber, king of the Huns. After my half-brothers cast me out, i was roaming the steppes alone, until i met you.
{=prebackstory_be_wanderer_hunnic_belar_str}My name is Belar of the Onogur clan.
{=backstory_a_be_wanderer_hunnic_belar_str}Back in my day, when we lived far in the east, i was respected as a warrior and a leader.

{=backstory_b_be_wanderer_hunnic_belar_str}When we started the western conquest, enemies fell before us and there was more gold and silver than we've ever dreamed possible. But for me, the thrill of the hunt and the glory of triumph was itself the reward.

{=backstory_с_be_wanderer_hunnic_belar_str}As for the other nobles: they kept pickering for even more treasures, slaves and lands for themselves. After a while i grew tired of the greedy bastards, and decided to let my sons carry my legacy onwards.
{=response_1_be_wanderer_hunnic_belar_str}But your tribe is still in the middle of conquest, how are you going to achieve triumphs if you leave the war behind?
{=response_2_be_wanderer_hunnic_belar_str}You are responsible for the fate of your family, you can't abandon them just because you dislike politics!

{=backstory_d_be_wanderer_hunnic_belar_str}I've only said that i've left the politics behind, not that i've abandoned either my family or the war itself! I will join a warband soon, and make my children rich with loot and proud by bravery in battle! And if i fall on the battlefield, then i'll finally rest with a smile on my face!

{=generic_backstory_be_wanderer_hunnic_belar_str}I'm a noble from the Onogur clan, but i've left the life of a chieftain behind. Now I'm trying to achieve greatness on the battlefield, without the constant backstabbing by tribal nobility.

{=str_culture_description.battania.text}North of Hadrian’s wall, the Pictish peoples have been trading and raiding with the Romans for centuries now, most recently overrunning most of Britannia in the “Great Barbarian Conspiracy” before being driven back. Despite the recent setback, the Caledonians have subsumed the Roman buffer peoples north of Hadrian’s wall, forming a “Great Northern Kingdom” of the Picts, unified and ready to exploit Roman weakness on the wall and beyond.

{=str_culture_description.vlandia.text}Deep in the forest zone bordering the north of the Pontic steppes, peoples barely known to the Romans eke out an existence in these frigid lands. Broadly known as the Venedians, these peoples are predecessors to the early Slavic peoples that will emerge on Roman borders in the 500s AD. Disparate and disorganized, they have yet to be more than a footnote to history, but with an emerging void to the south, the opportunity to make a name for themselves has begun to emerge.

{=str_culture_description.khuzait.text}A people never before encountered in Europe, the Huns were previously only known through the passing mentions of Bactrian merchants. Now, these heirs of the Xiongnu have been driven west into the Pontic by years of debilitating drought in the Eurasian steppes. Highly organized, skilled with the bow, lance, and sword alike, and spending much of their lives as cavalry, they are poised to be the Scourge of God, carving out a new empire in the heart of central and eastern Europe.

{=str_culture_description.sturgia.text}The Alemans have proven themselves against the Romans over the past century, testing their authority most recently a decade prior. Led by the powerful Iuthungi, their confederation stretches from the old Roman province of the Agri Decumates along the Danube to border their relatives in the Marcomans and Quadians. Like their neighbors to the north, the Alemans stand on the precipice of unification, ready to carve their own kingdom from the remains of their Roman adversaries.

{=str_culture_description.aserai.text}It has been ten years since the accession of Rome’s co-emperors, Valentinian and Valens. In the east, the Arian emperor Valens has maintained stability, while his religious tolerance has brought widespread support for his rule. Now, the Romans of Constantinople face their greatest challenge yet: the Sasanians are threatening a war over Roman violations of the treaty, while the Danubian peoples are being pushed into the Empire by an unknown power from the far East.

{=str_culture_description.empire.text}It has been ten years since the accession of Rome’s co-emperors, Valentinian and Valens. In the west, Valentinian’s adept leadership has quashed usurpations, improved the Empire’s infrastructure, and benefitted the population of the empire as a whole. Now, the empire stands at a precipice: Valentinian’s blindness to the excesses of his officials has resulted in rampant corruption and disloyalty, while Pannonia has been ravaged by the Quadians, incensed at the Roman assassination of their king.

{=str_culture_description.saxon.text}In the lands of the ancient Chauci and Chamavi, a new confederation has emerged to contest their Frankish and Frisian neighbors. The Saxons have already made a name for themselves raiding down the channel, allying with the usurper Magnentius, and exploiting the tumult of the “Great Barbarian Conspiracy.” At war with the powerful Franks, many find themselves pressured to seek out new lands across the sea in Roman Britannia.

{=str_culture_description.angle.text}For centuries the nordic tribes have traded and raided down the North Sea coast. Renowned for their fine metalwork and bog sacrifices, the Angles and Jutes are content in their position on the Jutland peninsula. Their Danish relatives control the islands of Kattegat, while he lands of Scandza are ruled by the Geatish tribes. As Roman power wanes in Britannia, the Angles might join their Saxon brethren to seek fertile lands overseas, leaving Jutland defenseless against the encroaching Danes.

{=str_culture_description.frankish.text}Over a century prior, the Bructeri, Chauci, Chamavi, and other confederations began to shift and merge into a new people: the Franks. Like their neighbors the Alemans, the Franks are not one united people per se, consisting of multiple warlords and many cantons. Having launched a massive invasion of Gaul a decade prior, some have established themselves across the Rhine as foederati, but these squabbling leaders may yet unite again to forge their own kingdom.
{=str_faction_ruler_name_with_title.frankish.text}{?RULER.GENDER}Queen{?}King{\?} {RULER.NAME}

{=str_culture_description.langobard.text}The people of “long beards” or Langobards once inhabited a region deep in Germania below Jutland along the Elbe river, but have since migrated upstream towards the Roman frontier. Situated behind their neighbors in the Burgundians, Quadians, and Marcomans, the Langobards have occasionally joined their neighbors in their quarrels against the Romans, but have yet to make a distinct name for themselves. They may one day prove to be a great power, if they can unite.
{=str_faction_ruler_name_with_title.langobard.text}{?RULER.GENDER}Queen{?}King{\?} {RULER.NAME}

{=str_culture_description.burgundian.text}The Burgundians were a people once unknown to the Romans, migrating from deep in Germania on the far side of the Elbe to the region near the source of the Neckar river, partially filling the void left by the Roman retreat out of the Agri Decumates. Disunited and intermingled with their neighbors in the Franks, Alemans, Suebians and Vandals, the Burgundians stretch far to the east to border the Goths, but are gradually moving westward under migratory pressure.
{=str_faction_ruler_name_with_title.burgundian.text}{?RULER.GENDER}Queen{?}King{\?} {RULER.NAME}

{=str_liege_title.burgundian.text}King of the Burgundians
{=str_liege_title_female.burgundian.text}Queen of the Burgundians

{=str_culture_description.marcomannic.text}In the age of Augustus the Marcomans were once the greatest of the Germanic confederations, ruling over all their Suebic neighbors in Baiohaemum and organized into a stratified society under their king Maroboduus. Under Marcus Aurelius they challenged the Romans in the decades-long Marcomannic wars. However, time and again Roman intervention has broken their confederation apart, and now they are a shadow of their former might.

{=str_faction_noble_name_with_title.marcomannic.text}{?RULER.GENDER}Chieftess{?}Chieftain{\?} {RULER.NAME}

{=str_liege_title_female.marcomannic.text}Queen of the Marcomans

{=str_culture_description.quadian.text}The Quadians have retained their ancient strength, emerging from the shadow of the Marcomannic neighbors. The Romans have recently begun constructing forts on the opposite side of the Danube in their territory, and now a Roman named Marcellianus has assassinated King Gabinius. Open war has broken out, and the Quadians seek revenge against the Romans across the river, with Pannonia ripe for the taking.
{=str_faction_ruler_name_with_title.quadian.text}{?RULER.GENDER}Queen{?}King{\?} {RULER.NAME}
{=str_faction_noble_name_with_title.quadian.text}{?RULER.GENDER}Chieftess{?}Chieftain{\?} {RULER.NAME}

{=str_liege_title.quadian.text}King of the Quadians
{=str_liege_title_female.quadian.text}Queen of the Quadians

{=str_culture_description.vandal.text}Once an ancient people known as the Lugii who lived along the Vistula river north of the Quadians, the Vandals now live in the valleys nestled between the slopes of the Carpathians, divided into the Silingi and Asdingi. Despite their mountainous homeland’s natural protection, the Vandals are being pressured by the arrival of Goths, Heruls, and Gepids from the East. With the waning of the power of their Suebic relatives, the Vandali may yet follow the route west into Rome if the opportunity arises.
{=str_faction_ruler_name_with_title.vandal.text}{?RULER.GENDER}Queen{?}King{\?} {RULER.NAME}
{=str_faction_noble_name_with_title.vandal.text}{?RULER.GENDER}Chieftess{?}Chieftain{\?} {RULER.NAME}

{=str_liege_title.vandal.text}King of the Vandals
{=str_liege_title_female.vandal.text}Queen of the Vandals

{=str_culture_description.gothic.text}The Goths are a broad group of peoples ranging from the Thervingians on the slopes of the Carpathians, to the Vesias in the nearby forest zone and the Greuthungians on the Pontic steppes. Under pressure from their neighbors the Alans, the Thervingians and Greuthungians have been moving to the Danube, becoming increasingly desperate for a settlement with the Romans. As their confederations collapse and food supplies dwindle, that desperation is on the verge of boiling over.
{=str_faction_ruler_name_with_title.gothic.text}{?RULER.GENDER}Queen{?}King{\?} {RULER.NAME}
{=str_faction_noble_name_with_title.gothic.text}{?RULER.GENDER}Chieftess{?}Chieftain{\?} {RULER.NAME}

{=str_liege_title.gothic.text}King of the Goths
{=str_liege_title_female.gothic.text}Queen of the Goths

{=str_culture_description.scottish.text}A century ago, the Gaelic peoples of Ulster and the Hebrides began to expand beyond their lands, raiding and settling the coasts of Argyll. Known as the Scoti to the Romans, the recent “Great Barbarian Conspiracy” has brought them to new heights, achieving victories beyond their imagination despite the Romans ultimately driving them back from Britannia. As Roman and Pictish power in the island wanes, the opportunity to build their own kingdom awaits.
{=str_faction_ruler_name_with_title.scottish.text}{?RULER.GENDER}Queen{?}King{\?} {RULER.NAME}

{=str_liege_title.scottish.text}King of the Scots
{=str_liege_title_female.scottish.text}Queen of the Scots

{=str_culture_description.sarmatian.text}A broad group of people speaking an Indo-Iranian language, the Sarmatians have dwelled on the Eurasian steppes for nearly eight centuries now. Famed for their skills as lancers and horse archers, their most prestigious kingdoms are those of the Iazyges and Roxalani on the edges of Roman Pannonia. The Sarmatians have now found themselves caught up in the dispute between the Quadians and Valentinian, and face a difficult war with Rome.
{=str_faction_ruler_name_with_title.sarmatian.text}{?RULER.GENDER}Queen{?}King{\?} {RULER.NAME}

{=str_liege_title.sarmatian.text}King of the Sarmatians
{=str_liege_title_female.sarmatian.text}Queen of the Sarmatians

{=str_culture_description.alanian.text}A loosely organized kingdom situated along the bends of the Don and the Volga, the Alans have dwelled in these pastures for centuries after being driven westward from the Kazakh steppes by the Sogdians. Now the Alans once again face the loss of their home as they are beset by another ancient Empire: a people who once called themselves the Xiongnu. As their kingdom collapses, the Alans prepare to mount a last stand against these invaders with their newfound allies in the Greuthungians.

{=str_liege_title.alanian.text}King of the Alans
{=str_liege_title_female.alanian.text}Queen of the Alans

{=str_culture_description.bosporan.text}The last of the ancient Greek colony states, the Kingdom of the Bosporus is what remains of the great Empire of Mithridates of Pontus, retaining their independence as a client state of the Romans. A fusion of Sarmatian, Hellenistic, and Roman culture, they field a unique blend of these traditions on the battlefield against the encroaching Greuthungians and Alans, who seek to unseat them as they seek a new home and refuge from the onslaught of strange new arrivals from the far east.
